title: League of Legends Launcher disappearing after pressing launch...
body: After waiting about 3 hours for league of legends to download the new client, it finally appeared... THE LAUNCH BUTTON. When I pressed it to launch... it disappeared... I tried everything from going through https://goo.gl/7N6MjW and restarting my computer a hundred friken times!!!! Nothing worked... Can anyone who experienced the same thing tell me how you fixed it yourself?

replies.body: If the 'L' is popping up and then disappearing, it sounds like League may not have the admin rights it needs to launch properly. Run through our [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if you're not sure how to set those up, and let me know if that doesn't help.
Thank You very much!!! This worked!!! I tried the last option of opening a new administrator profilr and redownload and it worked!!! thak you very much!!! You are a BOSSS
